snippet: Target will sell goods from five boutiques nationwide, made exclusively for the big chain.
lead_paragraph: HITTING THE RACKS From Sunday until June 16, TARGET stores nationwide and online will sell goods from five specialty stores across the country. The Candy Store, Cos Bar, Polka Dog Bakery, Privet House and the Webster have been commissioned to create affordable lines just for Target shoppers. The limited editions include everything from home décor and beauty products to caramel creams and flamingo-print dresses. Shoppers familiar with the Webster, the luxury boutique in Miami, will be pleased to know that Target will sell reasonably priced clothing like palm-tree print maxidresses, $44.99, and cap-toe wedges, $29.99. Target in New York City is at 517 East 117th Street; (212) 835-0860; target.com.
